channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Editable Table Simple Fast FrontEnd From Sql tables
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Editable Table Simple Fast FrontEnd From Sql tables

item.title: CVE-2021-24898|2024-08-03T19:49:14.027Z -- unknown -- editable%20table%20simple%20fast%20frontend%20from%20sql%20tables
item.description: The EditableTable WordPress plugin through 0.1.4 does not sanitise and escape any of the Table and Column fields, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
